snippet.title: FLINTHOOK Early Gameplay!
snippet.description:
4 minutes of gameplay from our upcoming action platformer, FLINTHOOK! See our space pirate hero shoot, hookshot and loot its way through a sample level!

www.flinthook.com

◭ Subscribe to Tribute Games videos: http://bit.ly/TributeGamesYT◭
◭ Pixel art games with a modern twist!◭

For fresh news about Tribute Games studio, visit http://www.tributegames.com
Twitter: @tributegames
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TributeGames
Tumblr: http://blog.tributegames.com/
